titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Arthur M. Free photograph collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-04-24T16:53-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Revised to add descriptions from photo card catalog by Sarah Patton.

did.abstract: Depicts German troops and war scenes on the Eastern and Western fronts during World War I, and scenes of the negotiation of the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk, 1918. Captions are in German.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Arthur M. Free photograph collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1933.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the library catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Depicts German troops and war scenes on the Eastern and Western fronts during World War I, and scenes of the negotiation of the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk, 1918. Captions are in German.

did.unittitle: 35 prints of German troops in Belgium and France and of war scenes on the western front during World War I
18 prints of German troops and war scenes on the Eastern front during World War I
5 prints of troops of the Central Powers on the Italian front and in Turkey during World War I
8 prints of German airplanes, fliers, ships, and seamen during World War I
4 prints of Allied soldiers captured by German troops during World War I
4 prints of Kaiser Wilhelm II and Crown Prince Wilhelm of Germany visiting the Western front
1 print of Prince Max of Baden; 1 print of General Paul von Hindenburg; 1 print of General Pavlo Skoropads'kii, hetman of the Ukraine

7 prints of scenes at the Brest-Litovsk Treaty negotiations with the Ukraine, members of the Central Powers' delegations (including Richard von Kuehlmann and General Max Hoffmann of Germany, Count Ottokar von Czernin of Austria, and Talaat Pasha of Turkey), and members of the Ukrainian delegation (including N. Liubyns'kyi, N. Levyts'kyi Aleksandr Sevriuk and Serhii Ostapenko)
